text: Boiling Lake is a hot lake, on the island of Dominica. It is about to across. The lake is about deep. The water at the edge of the lake is hot. It is about to . This makes it the second-biggest hot lake in the world, after Frying Pan Lake, in New Zealand. The lake is over a fumarole. It can be reached by hiking. It takes about three hours one way, from the nearest road. The lake is one of the sources of Rivi√®re Blanche, one of Dominica's main rivers. title: Boiling Lake
